Written by Non-Zero Day

Promise

Most of my life, I have been going in the wrong direction. I can tell, because numbers do not lie. I am overweight (at least forty-five pounds over), close to having zero in the bank (literally), borderline homeless (if I lose my job I have no alternative source of income), not as educated as I want to be. I pledge, that I will no longer have a Non-Zero Day! Moving forward I will improve in every aspect of my life (God, Family, Health and Education).

I here by PROMISE my future self, that I will hereby adhere to my words, that I will have a NON-ZERO DAY and will commit in doing and improving on each of the following daily:

  • God:
    • Daily prayer
    • Daily gratitude
  • Family:
    • Family time
    • Take more vacations!
  • Health:
    • Push-ups: No less than ten
    • Sit-up: No less than ten
    • Walk: No less than one mile
  • Read:
    • One Chapter of a book that inspires and/or changes my thinking
  • Education:
    • Certification: At least one technical certification per month
    • One hour and/or more in the following: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, SQL, Docker, AWS, Azure, Block chain, Solidity.

I will have a NON-ZERO DAY!
